trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around January 26th 2005
divs: sighting detailssighting report: when these sightings took place, i didn t realise i could report them, so it s been a while. six years ago i had two sightings around the same time. it was springtime, i was 17 years old and i lived on the 17th floor of an apartment building, facing east. the first sighting took place in the afternoon. i went to alternative school so i was home when my family was at work or school. the sky was clear, a very brilliant blue actually, and there was this one very strange giant white cloud right smack in the middle of the sky according to my perspective from my window. i was sort of intrigued by the strange cloud, so i looked at it for a long time. then these little dark triangular shapes started to "zip in and out of the cloud" [quoting zetatalk, i read that on there a year or so later which was obviously breath taking ... don t knock and\or diss zetatalk to me]. anyway, at first i thought they were birds. but their movement was so mechanical and in 15 years i almost never saw black birds there, only seagulls. i got my binoculars and i saw that they were not birds but black shiny triangles-type thingies. it went on for a long time. but that was all there was to it. the second sighting happened about a week later. i was lying in bed, and it was after 11 pm. i was suddenly compelled to look up at the sky. it was a perfectly clear night and i saw this solid round shape that looked like it was made of light. it wasn t too far above my building, and i saw it just as it was nearing the roof. before it reached the edge of the roof, it faded away and was gone just like that. i ve had so many other experiences since these sightings, but no other sightings, so i ma justa gonna keepa thosea to ma selfa :)
